thread.title: Girl commits suicide in Jharkhand after parents refuse to construct a toilet at home
thread.title_full: Girl commits suicide in Jharkhand after parents refuse to construct a toilet at home | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Girl commits suicide in Jharkhand after parents refuse to construct a toilet at home
text:
A 17-year-old girl allegedly committed suicide in Jharkhand’s Dumka district after her parents turned down her request to construct a toilet in the house.
According to reports, the parents wanted to save money for the girl’s marriage.
The girl was found hanging from the ceiling of her room by family members, according to police officials.
Further details are awaited.
First Published on July 04, 2015 11:22 am
